title: Episode 289: Severance
description: Theodore Shapiro – Severance (Main Title Theme) LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS The TV show Severance debuted on Apple TV+ in February 2022. It was created by writer Dan Erickson, and developed into a series by director and executive producer Ben Stiller. He directed the pilot and most of the episodes.
